name: Before The First Day
description:
Features
  • 🌲 Explore the tiny forest of your dreams in your journey to school 🌲
  • 👀 Face 1 enemy and several objects that can damage you 👀
  • 🍏 Find the jars of Apple Jam to regenerate lost energy 🍏
  • 🪁 Ride to the skies...if you dare... 🪁
  • 🚪 Solve the puzzle of the final door 🚪
Known issues
  • R to restart the game anytime (not mentioned but works)
  • On game-start (intro text), you actually can control the character
  • AI doesn't chase you :( but will decrease your health if you're in hug-distance
  • Something might throw you off the map if you jump at the right moment
  • Might be able to get stuck in between trees if you try really hard...
  • No SFX/VFX :(
  • Some missing collision with the door
  • Restart is very sudden upon death
  • Spot light doesn't go away after key is collected
  • Planned for 2 more levels: Farm/Ranch + Indoor/Castle, but would have never made it in time for the jam, so threw all the mechanics i had in the Forest level...

NOTE: 1 x 3d asset from rakutin (sketchfab), assets from Kenney's free packs, Mixamo for main character + animations, music via AIVA, everything else created in the jam.

Made for Cozy Fall Jam 2022 in 2 days.
